Body:
a = 0.8
beta = 0.5
corr = ccl.correlation_multipole(COSMO, a, beta, l, sval)
assert np.all(np.isfinite(corr))
assert np.shape(corr) == np.shape(sval)
pytest.mark.parametrize('l', [0, 2, 4])pytest.mark.parametrize('sval', [50, 50.0, np.logspace(1, 2, 5), [r for r in
    np.logspace(1, 2, 5)]])
